snippet.title: Railroad Corporation 2 - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to Railroad Corporation 2's teaser trailer! Railroad electrification is the way forward in the new age of the train. Set a pace to prosperity in Railroad Corporation 2. Power your railroad business by building routes across the region, evolve a network of tracks and locomotives to transport goods and passengers, and outpace the competition!

Wishlist Now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1677970/Railroad_Corporation_2

Stay up to date with Railroad Corporation 2 and Iceberg Interactive: 

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/railroadcorporation/ https://www.facebook.com/iceberginteractive

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/corbiegames
http://twitter.com/Iceberg_Int

Discord:
http://discord.gg/iceberginteractive

Official website:
http://www.railroadcorporation.com/

Steam publisher page:
http://bit.ly/IcebergOnSteam
